item.title: Example Talk
item.description: Embed your slides or video here using shortcodes. Further details can easily be added using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: When Notebooks are not Enough: Constructing Workflows for Reproducible Analytics
item.description: I will use a concrete analytical example to demonstrate how constructing workflows for reproducible analyses can serve as the next step from computational notebooks towards creating an analytical software. First, I will demonstrate a reproducible graphing system designed for the IPDLN-2018 hackathon , organized by Statistics Canada. The system evaluates synthetic socioeconomic and mortality data with logistic regression. Then I will discuss the workflow of the project that implements this graphing system ( github.
